metadata.description: Claude Code plugins maintained by kokuyouwind

plugins.name: rbs-goose
plugins.description: Setup rbs type definitions for steep and automatically fix type errors

plugins.name: dev-guidelines
plugins.description: Development workflow guidelines with skills for Git branch management, testing practices, Docker environment handling, debugging/investigation, architecture decisions, and PR descriptions

plugins.name: issue-resolver
plugins.description: GitHub Issue解決プロセスを自動化するスキル。Issue種別を判定し、種別ごとに適切な解決手順を提供します

plugins.name: code-like-prompt
plugins.description: Collection of commands that execute code-like prompts demonstrating programming concepts through interactive scenarios
